Sustain me baby

It’s no fun, and it’s no excitement. But I feel like it’s the one thing that really sustains me. It’s the only thing that does not overwhelm me with guilt and self-loathing at the end of the day.

What is it?

Discipline and intentionally choosing my values over my emotions.

Even when it comes to self-care, when emotion feels so close to what I should do to maintain self-love, there’s still a fine line between values and feelings as to what I should choose to act on.

Three lines for these days:

  1. Don’t live in misery

  2. Act on your values, not emotions

  3. Take good care of yourself

Side note:

My four burners as drawn by html and css.
